Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The location is the center of the Charleston market located at the intersection of I-26 and Mall Drive just South of I-526.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
2401 Mall Drive is a Class A, two story, 150,000 SF office building with ample surface parking surrounding the building. The majority of the space is wide open and the building is ready for occupancy. 

The first floor is 81,974 SF
The second floor is 75,000 SF

The facility has a commercial kitchen / cafeteria, fitness center, offices, and conference facilities. Great access, public transportation, shopping, dining, banking in the area, and central location.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Class A, two story, 150,000 SF office building with ample surface parking

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: NEWLY RENOVATED WITH HIGH END FINISHES, 3 STORY CLASS A OFFICE BUILDING. EXCELLENT VISIBILITY AND ACCESS AS WELL AS AMPLE PARKING. RECENT RENOVATIONS TO THE ENTIRE INTERIOR AND ALL COMMON AREAS AS WELL AS NEW HVAC SYSTEMS, PARKING LOT AND ROOF.  LANDLORD HAS SPARED NO EXPENSE AND THE BUILDING LOOKS GREAT.

Attractive Class A office building currently undergoing many common area upgrades.  Faber Executive Park is the only real office park in all of Charleston proper.  3875 Faber offers efficient layouts on three floors and boasts a well above average parking count at ~4.7/1000.
One story multi-tenant office building in Faber Place Executive Center. The space is for sublease though 12/31/20.Unit 100. Beautiful space ready to move into.

One Story multi-tenant office building in Faber Place Executive Center. This space is for sublease through 12/31/20. Beautiful space ready to move into. The rent is $13.92 / SF NNN. The CAMTI is estimated at $4.56 / SF.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: One Story multi-tenant office building in Faber Place Executive Center.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: One story multi-tenant office building. Suite 100 is 4,615 SF and is available for sublease through 12/31/20. The rent is $13.92 / SF and the CAMTI is 5.05 / SF.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: In North Charleston, in the The Executive Park at Faber Place just off 1-26.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE is pleased to exclusively offer for lease River Oaks Center, a 4-story 100,000 SF Class A office building located in North Charleston, SC. River Oaks Center is located in Charlestons largest office park  The Executive Park at Faber Place. The multi-tenant building has highly efficient floor plates and a state-of-the-art lobby with free WiFi and coffee.

River Oaks Center boasts ample parking and an ideal location just off I-526 minutes from the Charleston International Airport and I-26. With suites available from 1,500 sq. ft. and a generous tenant improvement allowance, tenants of all sizes will find 4401 Leeds Avenue to be an ideal fit for their office needs.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 4-story, 100,000 SF Class A office building in North Charleston office park
